New Records: The Houston Rockets achieved a new record with their 10th road win of the season, surpassing what they had achieved until March 29, 2024.
Key Match Events: Jalen Green showcased his offensive prowess, averaging 27.6 points and shooting 47.7% from the field in his first five games of January, contributing to the Rockets' 4-1 record during that stretch.
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets were expected to be a play-in team heading into the season but have exceeded expectations, currently sitting at 25-12 in the conference.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets' win over the Memphis Grizzlies marked a significant milestone in their turnaround season, with Jalen Green leading the team to success despite challenges earlier in the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jalen Green's improved defensive play and overall performance have been crucial to the Rockets' success, with head coach Ime Udoka emphasizing the importance of defense.
